name: Bad Bot - Robolution
description:
A 3D Metroidvania about a Bot that is board of its place in the factory.

Get upgrades, collect scrap and destroy other Bots.

Find all the B.0.Bs and fight to B.0.S.S!

Made for the Metroidvania Month 15 Game Jam

FOR BEST EXPERIENCE PLAY DOWNLOADABLE VERSION

New the 3D, some of the effects that I made and the additive loading may cause a few hitches in the Web version - download the build version if you experience major stutters
